content:
本件保存七年
02-62- 199 4
June 28, 2
MEMORANDUM
10 : Fr. R. L. Hirshberg Program Officer, U.S. AID/Q
FROM : C. C. Chang Original signed by Chief, Second Division C. C. Chang
SUBJECT : Excess Equipment
Referring to the Local Area Sergoning Liet No. 1122- 62-63044 issued by the U.S. Naval Support Activity at Taipei, we are forwarding herewith a requirement list of THB, PHB, KIHE and Kohli. If you concur and the listed excess supplies are available, plesso initiate necessary action for acquisition.
Encl. Liet No. N122-62-63044 Requirement list
cc: JGuhite (with requirement list) THB, PHB, KIHB, KaHB (with requirement list) 20, 3D, AD (with requirement list)
E- 16.13.2
附件抽存編號
10154
1218 Academia Historica
51. 3. 100×200
234

FROM : C. C. Chang Original signed by Chief, Second Division C. C. Chang

Referring to the Local Area Sergoning Liet No. 1122- 62-63044 issued by the U.S. Naval Support Activity at Taipei, we are forwarding herewith a requirement list of THB, PHB, KIHE and Kohli. If you concur and the listed excess supplies are available, plesso initiate necessary action for acquisition.
